Summon the Directing Talismanic Officers:
Burn incense and invoke the Year-Directing Xunuo He, the Day-Directing Bojiri, the Night-Watch Directing Star Sovereigns, and the Twenty-Eight Constellations’ Directing Talismanic Officers and Soldiers. Upon hearing this summons, hasten to descend.

Submit the Petition Talisman:
Write in cinnabar on yellow paper. At the appropriate time, form the Twelve Palaces mudrā and burn it. Affix the Guiding Talisman to the front of the official document.

Dispatch the Earth-Seizing Mountain-Subduing Direct Talisman:
Mighty soldiers, swiftly as decreed by law.
To the right, dispatch the Day-Directing [Name] and the Constellation-Directing Talismanic Officer, together with the Middle Realm Merit Officers.

Seek the Universal Salvation Officers:
Each day, determine which Day-Directing and Constellation-Directing Talismanic Officers govern the Middle Realm. On jiazi days, summon those like the Rat-Headed Merit Officer in plain robes, who wear twin swords at their waists. Visualize them while burning the talisman.

Summoning Crane Joint Talisman:
Write two talismans in cinnabar on yellow paper. Affix one to the front of the petition and the other to the official document.
Jade Clarity’s Primordial Azure, Jade Talisman proclaims the covenant.
Proceed directly to Southern Marchmount, swiftly pursue the crane.
At the summons, come immediately, without delay or pause.
Where the joint talisman arrives, all spirits obey.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by Jade Clarity’s Supreme Thearch and by law.

Crane-Urging Talisman:
Write in cinnabar on yellow paper and burn in the incense censer. Prepare twenty or thirty talismans and burn them for best effect.
Supreme Great Mystery, thirty-six heavens.
Bestow upon me the true talisman to command gods and spirits.
When the divine talisman arrives, all spirits comply.
The six senses become clear and awakened, the Dao enters the profound mystery.
Fortune and misfortune foreknown, attaining the Dao and long life.
Now summon the simurgh and crane, hasten to descend.
Spiritual officers, come together, without negligence or disobedience.
[Six characters illegible] stars, Six Ding, Six Jia, Six Jia, Six Ding.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by law.
Simurgh and crane, simurgh and crane, come swiftly, come swiftly.
At noon, when the audience concludes, each returns to its original position.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by law.

Crane-Returning Incantation:
In the mountains, return to the mountains; on the marchmounts, return to the marchmounts.
At the summons, come immediately, without violating the appointed time.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by Jade Clarity’s Supreme Thearch and by law.

Petition to the Sacred Thearch of Southern Marchmount:
[Your] humble servant, [Name] of such-and-such position.
To the right, [I], [Name], now submit this petition...

May it deeply concern [Your Eminence] that the worldly and foolish remain deluded, disbelieving in the Dao and its methods. Now desiring to propagate the teachings and spread their influence, that the people may come to revere them and the Great Dao flourish, [I] humbly approach Your August Marchmount to request the loan of several simurghs and cranes. On such-and-such a day at noon, may they descend to the ritual altar, circling and dancing above and below, offering obeisance with bowed heads and bared forms. When the noon audience concludes, may they be immediately dispatched back to their posts, without daring to linger.

Furthermore, [I] beseech the dispatch of the Blue-Green Controller of Cranes, the spirit officer of Penglai, to attend the altar and witness the covenant of the fast. This petition is hereby respectfully submitted.

[Your] humble servant, [Name], most reverently presents this petition before the Sacred Thearch of the Southern Marchmount, Controller of Heaven’s Luminous Might. May Your Sagely Compassion deign to grant this earnest plea. Issue commands to the master of the Simurgh-and-Crane Bureau to promptly act in accordance with the matters herein submitted, swiftly dispatching them to ensure the ritual’s completion, transforming both humans and celestials, and perfecting the fast in all its aspects.

[I], [Name], presuming upon Your Sacred Authority, am filled with trembling awe. Respectfully submitted.

In the year of ___, the ___ month, the ___ day, [Name], of such-and-such position, submits this petition.

Submitted to the Master of the Simurgh-and-Crane Bureau of Penglai Mountain, the Perfected Lord of the Day.

On the day following the ritual, a second missive shall be sent, dispatching the Perfected Officer of the current stellar lodge, along with the Directing Talisman, and the Intermediary Director of Merit-Officials, to urgently summon twelve, twenty-four, or thirty-six simurghs and cranes, as well as one spirit officer, to attend the altar. Issue the summons again.

The Seven Spirit Officers of Penglai Mountain Who Control Cranes:
First Spirit Officer: Radiant Rosy Clouds
Second Spirit Officer: Jade Radiance
Third Spirit Officer: Golden Fusion
Fourth Spirit Officer: Bian Wen
Fifth Spirit Officer: Treasure Radiance
Sixth Spirit Officer: Qi Yang
Seventh Spirit Officer: Elegant Fruit

These seven spirit officers take turns beginning on the first day of each month. However, on the last day of the lunar month and the full-moon day, the spirit officer named Vermilion Lake does not fall under their jurisdiction and will not respond to summons. Only during the Nine-Yin Yellow Register Grand Offering to the Boundless Heavens will he arrive promptly. At other times, if summoned in jest or frivolity, the invocation will prove ineffective.

This method was taught by the Patriarchal Iron-Crutch Perfected Lord of All Immortals, the August Thearch of the East, who, atop Mount Qingcheng, assembled the host of immortals and summoned cranes from the Southern Marchmount, which arrived riding the void. When the affair concluded, they returned. The teaching was later transmitted to Zhongli, the Perfected Lord of Upright Yang, and to the Purple Void Perfected Lady Wei of the Southern Marchmount. It was then passed to Lord Lü Dongbin, the Perfected Lord of Pure Yang, who transmitted it to the Immortal Liu Haichan. He, in turn, bestowed it upon the Purple Yang Perfected Lord Zhang of Mount Tiantai. From generation to generation, it has been transmitted thus, reaching the ninth-generation lineage-holding immortal master, the Jade Tube Immortal Elder, through whom it has spread unbroken to the present day.

In the final days of the jiachen year, I unexpectedly had the good fortune to attend a gathering at the Treasure Canopy Grotto of Wuyang, where I served with wholehearted devotion. On the celestial腊 day of the yisi year, I presented this petition with incense, prostrated myself, and entreated my master to accept me as a disciple, to enlighten me on the firing times of the golden elixir’s transformations. From that moment, the secret transmission resonated within me, and all proved true. Thus, I reflect that my master’s kindness towers higher than Mount Sumeru and runs deeper than the vast sea; though I were to grind my bones to powder, I could never repay such virtue.

Did not my master say: “Diligence without encounter leads one to meet a perfected being; encounter without diligence consigns one to become a lowly ghost.” Day and night, through the twelve double-hours, I never forget this admonition. Resolutely, I press forward, my resolve growing ever firmer, vowing to attain the pure, liberated, supreme, and perfectly true Great Dao. Thereby may I deliver my primal ancestors, my three masters and dharma friends, and all karmically connected kin through countless kalpas, universally extending to all beings throughout the dharma realm, that together we may ascend to the joys of the immortals’ realm. How could I dare let this life slip by in vain?

Time passes swiftly, and after several years, I unexpectedly obtained the immortal master’s book on summoning cranes—was this mere chance? Twice, thrice, I prostrated myself upon the earth, paying homage to the patriarchal and immortal masters, and was deemed worthy of receiving their transmission. Thus empowered, I may practice and uphold it, revering the immortal transformations and attaining fruition as a perfected being.

Those who summon cranes must be cultivators of the true, bearers of registers, whose virtue extends to others, whose accumulated merits fill the heavens, whose beneficence nurtures the myriad people, who pray for timely rain and sunshine, who deliver the living and the dead, whose mysterious works are vast and profound, whose names are inscribed on the immortal ranks, and who hold offices of the first or second rank—only such may perform this rite. It is most efficacious.

However, it must be conducted within the great karmic affinity of the Crane Assembly Fast of the Patriarchs, and only then may it be performed three days in advance. The appointed day and hour must be strictly observed for the invocation to prove effective. Those who are not of high rank, office, or virtue may not summon them.

Whoever obtains this method must guard it carefully and not lightly disclose it. Those who do so will immediately incur heavenly retribution. How could one not be cautious? Keep it secret, keep it secret!

**End of *Dharma Ocean’s Lost Pearls*, Scroll Fourteen**
#1 *Method for Petitioning the Dipper to Seek Longevity*: Transmitted by the Southern Lineage of the Golden Elixir School during the Song and Yuan dynasties.
#2 *Secret Method for Summoning the Crane*: Transmitted by the Southern Lineage of the Golden Elixir School during the Song and Yuan dynasties.

**Beginning of *Dharma Ocean’s Lost Pearls*, Scroll Fifteen**
*Protocol for the Conjoined Refinement Memorial Rite*

**Incantation for Purifying the Mouth (Recited Upon Entering the Altar)**
Spirit of the cinnabar mouth, expel filth and dispel miasma;
Spirit of the tongue, rectify order, link life and nurture the spirit.
Spirits of the thousand teeth, repel evil and guard the true.
Spirit of the throat, Mighty Tiger, conducts qi and guides fluids.
Spirit of the heart, Cinnabar Prime, enables my communion with the true.
Spirit of thought refines the essence; the upright qi endures forever.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances!*

**Incantation for Purifying the Body**
Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy, pacify and comfort this bodily form.
Disciples’ hun and po, five viscera in profound darkness:
Azure Dragon brings auspicious fortune, White Tiger guards the form.
Vermilion Bird watches over, Dark Warrior gathers essence.
Bloody corpses and foul impurities, malevolent forces subside in concealment.
Seven fluids flow aright; five viscera transform and generate.
I uphold this divine incantation—*Primordial, Prosperous, Beneficent, Steadfast*.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances!*

**Incantation for Purifying Heaven and Earth**
Within the cavern, emptiness and mystery; radiant and vast, the Great Prime.
Mighty spirits of the eight directions, render me natural.
Numinous Treasure talismanic decree, universally proclaimed to the Nine Heavens.
*Qianluo Danna*, Cavern Stem of the Great Mystery,
Slay demons, bind evil, annihilate ten thousand ghosts.
Central Mountain divine incantation, Jade Text of the Primordial Beginning.
Recite once to repel ghosts and prolong life;
Traverse the Five Peaks, let the Eight Seas bear witness.
Demon kings bow their heads, attending and guarding my chamber.
Malevolent impurities dissolve and disperse; the Dao’s darkness endures forever.
*Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and ordinances!*

**Offering Incense and Presenting the Prayer**
Jade splendor scatters light; ninefold qi congeals as mist.
Fragrant clouds densely woven, ascend directly to the Nine Heavens.
Golden Lad Attending Incense, Jade Maiden Transmitting Words,
Receive and convey the fragrant smoke, ascending to the Emperor’s presence.
Let the petitions I now present be granted in full, as spoken.

The officiant, the humble servant [Name], reverently kindles incense, prostrates twice, and respectfully addresses the Three Pristine Supreme Saints, the Ten Loftiest Perfected, the Nine Celestial Thrones of the Divine Empyrean, the Ten Directions’ Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthies, the Thirty-Two Heavenly Sovereigns, the Palace of the Sun’s Grand Yang Lord, the Mansion of the Moon’s Grand Yin Sovereign, the Great Sage of the Celestial Stem, the Star Lords of the Seasonal Nodes, the Nine Leaping Star Lords of Supreme Clarity, the Six Offices of the Southern Dipper’s Longevity Star Lords, the Seven Origins of the Northern Dipper’s Deliverance Star Lords, the Three Terraces and Canopy Star Lords, the Twelve Palaces’ Hour Star Lords, the Twenty-Eight Constellations’ Star Lords, the Three Origins’ Three Ranks’ Three Officials’ Great Emperors, the Four Sagely Perfected of the Northern Culmen’s Dharma Lord, the Five Masters of the Mystery’s Teaching Lord, the Ancestral Master of Orthodox Unity’s Quiescent Response and Manifest Blessing Perfected Lord, the Left Palace Immortal Elder of the Supreme Ultimate, the Three Ministries of Thunder, the Nine Bureaus of Thunder, the Arrayed Lofty Perfected of the Purple Palace’s Gate, the Sagely Hosts of Thunder, the Sacred Emperors of the Five Peaks and Five Mountains, the Great Emperor of Fengdu in the Earthly Prison, the Ten Palaces’ Perfected Lords of the Netherworld, the Great Emperor of Fusang in the Watery Palace, the attending thunder deities, officials, generals, and soldiers, and all true lords of the Three Realms and Ten Directions.

May the sagely compassion turn its numinous gaze upon me. I formerly submitted to the tutelage of Preceptor [Name], who memorialized and conferred upon me the talismanic methods of the Supreme Ultimate’s Northern Culmen Jade Treasury, Mysterious Numinosity, Supreme Ultimate, Three Luminaries, and Five Thunders, which I have reverently received and worn upon my person. I have vowed to act as Heaven’s proxy in transforming the world, aiding the state and saving the people, conducting all practices to succor humanity and benefit all beings. In every supplication I offer, I humbly beseech the divine to grant its numinous response.

I prostrate myself, praying that the Great Dao will bestow its compassion, that the myriad heavens will commend my devotion, that my reverent and earnest intent will be cherished, and my past errors and transgressions pardoned. May the Black Registers erase my faults, my immortal rank advance, my departed kin attain deliverance, and all my movements be secure. May the Dao’s qi sustain me, and its numinous radiance illumine me from above. May my body and mind attain purity, so that no evil may assail me. May governance be solemn and orderly, and the hundred spirits stand guard in solemn array. I rely upon the virtue of creation and sustenance, that it may accord with the sincerity of my heart.

The officiant bows his head, knocks his forehead to the ground, and prostrates twice in reverence.

Then, facing east, he clicks his teeth and declares:
The humble servant respectfully addresses the Grand Yang Lord of the Sun Palace. May the sagely compassion permit my petition. May the true qi of the Grand Yang descend and pour into my body, expelling all perverse qi, severing the one hundred and four ailments. Where I gaze upon mountains, may they crumble; where I behold seas, may they dry. Where I regard illness, may it be cured; where I look upon people, may they live. May people take refuge, may ghosts be subdued, and may evil not encroach upon the upright.

With his left hand, he traces the mao trigram, visualizing above his left temple a sun within which stands a disheveled-headed general. The qi of nine rays, like nine strands, descends and pours in, entering through the Sixfold Union Palace of the left side, illuminating body and mind. The Sixfold Union Palace lies one cun above the brow, where the sun returns to the left Sixfold Union.

Secret incantation:
Spirit of Yu Yi, true numen of the Li Palace.
Pour forth the nine rays, primordial, prosperous, advantageous, and steadfast.
[Recited three times]

Upon completing the incantation, he glances to the left side of his head, one chi and five cun away, where nine strands of luminous qi appear. He inhales them into his heart with his mouth.

He recites again:
Oṃ.

Oṃ *va-□-ra-hvī-ca-lī svāhā.*
[Recited nine times]

Next, he faces west and clicks his teeth, addressing above:
Your servant humbly invokes the Supreme Yin Sovereign of the Moon Palace. May Your sagely compassion grant this petition: descend the Jade Radiance of the Supreme Yin, pouring black luminosity into this servant’s body, driving out perverse qi, severing the one hundred and four ailments. Where mountains are beheld, mountains crumble; where seas are seen, seas run dry; where illness is observed, illness is cured; where people are regarded, people flourish. People take refuge; ghosts are subdued and banished; the perverse do not encroach upon the upright.

With his right hand, he traces the you trigram, visualizing above his right temple a moon within which stands a Jade Maiden, holding a ritual scepter. The qi of ten rays, like ten strands, descends and pours in, entering through the Sixfold Union Palace of the right side, illuminating body and mind.

Next, the secret incantation:
Spirit of Jielin, true essence of the Kan Palace.
Round and radiant, ten rays—auspicious, advantageous, and primally flourishing.
[Recited three times]

Upon completing the incantation, he glances to the right side of his head, one chi and five cun away, where ten strands of luminous qi appear. He inhales them into his heart with his mouth.

He recites again:
Oṃ.

Oṃ vaṃ raḥ raḥ svāhā. [Recited ten times]

Next, facing south, he knocks his teeth and addresses the heavens:
Your servant humbly invokes the Great Sage Star Lord of the Celestial Stem. May Your sagely compassion grant this petition: descend with the golden light of upright qi, pour it into this servant’s body, expel perverse qi, sever the one hundred and four ailments. Mountains crumble at the sight, seas dry at the gaze; the sick recover, the living thrive; people take refuge; ghosts are subdued and banished; the perverse do not encroach upon the upright.

With his left hand, he traces the chen trigram; with his right, he forms the sword mudra.

Next, the secret incantation:
Chapter of Śakra Devānām Indra, girded with the Celestial Stem.
The malevolent ghosts of the five directions—
why have they not vanished?
With a single inhalation of the flying immortal,
ten thousand ghosts hide in submission.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

Upon completing the incantation, he visualizes the Celestial Stem standing in a yellow cloud above his head, clad in plain silk, hair unbound and feet bare, resembling Zhenwu, three-eyed, wielding the Fire Command Sword. From his central eye issues the qi of golden light, which he inhales through his mouth, feeling the golden light fill his mouth, then blows it to coil around his body.

He recites again:
Oṃ. Spirit of the imperial command, true numen of the Dipper’s Pole.
Seven rays flow in radiance—hūṃ tṣaḥ [sound lost].

Upon completing the incantation, he closes his mouth, steadies his breath, and fixes his gaze.

The secret incantation:
Great Sage of the Celestial Stem, foremost star of the Northern Dipper,
golden light of upright qi—
pour into my form.
Demons are all purged;
the body attains longevity.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

Upon completing the incantation, he inhales the qi of the Heavenly Gate and blows it onto the gen trigram, then traces the yin trigram.

The secret incantation:
Oṃ.

Hūṃ hūṃ tát lì suō hē chì shè. Seven times. Upon completing the incantation, from the *yín* trigram he traces upward to the *chén* position, then flicks outward, visualizing the central eye of the Celestial Stem emitting golden light, which pours down to suffuse his body and heart.

Next, he retreats a step, taps his teeth three times, and forms the *biànshén* mudra with both hands—left at the *chén* position, right at the *yǒu* position—then rests them at his waist. First, he visualizes his body as withered wood, pinches the *wǔ* position with both hands, inhales a mouthful of southern *qi*, and blends it with his heart’s *qi* to form true fire. Flicking the *wǔ* position, he ignites the fire at the wood’s roots, burning upward all at once. Next, he pinches the *sì* position, summoning the *xùn* wind to scatter the ashes, leaving no trace of dust or shadow.

He visualizes an infant within his cinnabar field gradually growing, hair unbound and feet bare, clad in a black robe and golden armor, appearing like the True Warrior. Beneath his feet, a dark turtle exhales *qi*; pinching the *zǐ* position, the turtle’s head stirs. The *qi* merges with his kidney *qi*. A red serpent exhales *qi*, merging with his heart *qi*; pinching the *wǔ* position, the serpent’s head stirs. The Northern Dipper enshrouds his body, the Three Terraces stand before him, a sun to his left and a moon to his right. The Celestial Stem hovers above his head, a mighty warrior holding a seven-starred black banner to his left, another mighty warrior bearing a sword case to his right. A circular image crowns his head, its radiance illuminating heaven and earth. Generals and officials stand in solemn array. His left hand forms the Northern Emperor’s mudra, the middle finger pinching the center of the thumb, while his right hand forms the sword mudra.

The secret incantation:
By the law of heaven, numinous and divine,
Great Spirit of the Dark Warrior.
Treading upon the coiling serpent,
crowned with the seven stars.
Wielding the divine sword,
gaze fixed upon the Heavenly Gate.
Might pervades heaven and earth,
enthroned at the Northern Asterism.
Mountain sprites and wayward ghosts
vanish a thousand leagues away.
Grasping the celestial prison,
Great Spirit of the Heavenly Armor,
swiftly descend beneath the altar,
interrogate the nameless.
Where the heavenly records arrive,
forever sever the demonic essence.
Deliver the people from suffering,
bestow great might and numen.
Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and command.

Visualizing the spirits in practice:
The Three Hun return to the liver. The liver resides on the left; pinch the *mǎo* position. Visualize three Daoists atop the left side of his head, clad in azure robes, blown by the eastern blue *qi*. They enter from the left Six Harmonies, descend from the upper palate, and he receives them with his tongue, guiding them past the Twelve-Storied Tower to lodge within the liver’s three lobes, like an azure lapis lazuli palace.

The Seven Po return to the lungs. The lungs reside in the center; pinch the *yǒu* position. Visualize seven stars atop the right side of his head, each containing seven Daoists in plain white robes, blown by the western white *qi*. They descend behind the brain, down the spine, spiraling into the shoulder well, passing through the Twelve-Storied Tower to enter the lungs, standing within the jade palace.

Wisdom returns to the spleen; pinch the center of the middle finger. Visualize a monkey and a horse, suffused by the golden light *qi*. They descend from the center of the forehead, passing the Twelve-Storied Tower and the stomach’s entrance, where a golden child sprays water. The monkey and horse, drenched, transform into a golden lion, which he rides downward into the spleen. The monkey is devoured by a *ní* beast, the horse becomes a *bó* steed, and the *ní* stands atop the *bó*, both entering the spleen, which he visualizes as a golden chamber.

Essence returns to the kidneys; pinch the *zǐ* position. Visualize two kidneys along the spine, fuzzy like the sun and moon, the left *qi* with nine strands, the right *qi* with ten rays, piercing straight through the crown to the Parents’ Palace—the Mud Pill Palace. There, he sees the Parents’ Palace’s purple *qi* descending in nine strands from the left; he taps his teeth and calls: "Grand Unity Lord," three times. It flows directly into the kidneys. He calls: "Peach Health Lord," three times. He sees a figure like himself entering the left kidney palace, black clouds dispersing, revealing a clear blue sky and bright sun. Again, he visualizes the Parents’ Palace’s purple *qi* descending in ten rays from the right; he taps his teeth and calls: "Director of Destinies Lord," three times. It flows directly into the kidneys. He calls: "Union and Extension Lord," three times. He sees a woman-like figure entering the right kidney palace, black clouds retreating, revealing a clear blue sky and bright sun. He visualizes a pool of water within the cinnabar field congealing into ice-jade, solid and unmoving, illuminated by the sun and moon’s radiance from the kidneys. Pinch the *zǐ* position.

The spirit returns to the heart; pinch the *wǔ* position. Visualize the True Warrior’s form within the cinnabar field, identical to his own, summoning the spirits of his entire body.

The secret incantation:
May the ten thousand spirits unite with my heart.
Seven times.

Soon, he sees the ten thousand spirits, all like stars, countless in number, ascending into the golden tower and jade chamber. He visualizes his heart like a great fire pearl, celestial flames blazing. The fire pearl holds a dewdrop in its mouth, which drips onto the true person’s body, drawing all the spirits to enter through his mouth into the pearl’s inner tower, where they recite scriptures.

The secret incantation:
Cinnabar Origin, Cinnabar Palace,
merge with the hundred spirits.
Three times; pinch the *wǔ* position.

Manifesting the Four Numinous Beasts:
The Azure Dragon, Mèngzhāng; pinch *yín*, *jiǎ-yín*. Visualize the liver’s blue *qi* emerging from the left eye as an azure dragon, attending to his left. The Azure Dragon Lord holds a dragon banner in one hand and wields a sword in the other, standing beside the azure dragon.

The White Tiger, Jiānbīng; pinch the *shēn* position and *jiǎ-shēn*.

He visualizes the white *qi* within his lungs emerging from his nose as a white tiger, attending to his right. The White Tiger Lord wields a sword in one hand and holds a tiger banner in the other, standing beside the white tiger.

Above, the Vermilion Phoenix of Numinous Radiance; pinch the *wǔ* position and *jiǎ-wǔ*. He visualizes the red *qi* within his heart emerging from his mouth as a vermilion phoenix, spitting fire from its beak and flapping its wings above his head.

Below, the Dark Warrior Holding Brightness; pinch the *zǐ* position and *jiǎ-zǐ*. He visualizes the black *qi* within his kidneys emerging from his left ear as the Dark Warrior, stationed behind him.

He visualizes a lion emerging from below his navel, roaring before him. Two white cranes emerge from the Six Harmonies Palace, flying in crossing patterns above his shoulders. His hands move from *xū* to *chén*.

Secret incantation:
□□□□□□□.
Celestial spirits flourish in their nodes,
may they guard my long life.
The Supreme Mystery’s One,
protects the true form.
The spirit lords of the five viscera,
each ensure peace and tranquility.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command.

The Three Terraces give me birth at *sì*; the Three Terraces nurture me at *wǔ*; the Three Terraces protect me at *wèi*. Next, pinch the Dipper and recite:
The stalwart *kuí* and *gāng* of *chén* and *xū* enter the Central Palace to seize.
The *kuí* and *gāng* of *chén* and *xū* enter the Central Palace to seize.
*Jiǎ-chén* and *jiǎ-xū* enter the Central Palace.

Next recite:
Heaven shines bright, earth spirits glow.
I am the summoning envoy,
born before heaven and earth.
I act as heaven and earth’s messenger,
standing as heaven and earth’s sentinel.
Disasters and harm meet self-destruction,
fortune and blessings arise of themselves.
Not only do I restrain tigers and wolves,
I can also shatter the five weapons.
Divine dragons dare not display their power,
spirit ghosts dare not exercise their numen.
Point at mountains and they crumble,
point at seas and they dry up,
point at stones and they split,
point at sun and moon and they shine together.
Wherever I walk, sit, lie, or stand,
ten thousand soldiers always follow.
Wherever my hand points,
wind, fire, lightning, and radiance arise.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command.

The incantation complete, cross his hands, pinch the Yin-Yang Dipper, and flick upward. He visualizes the altar suffused with resplendent golden light, illuminating the ten directions.

Incantation:
The Northern Dipper lofty and proud,
the Dipper’s handle radiates might.
Strike mountains and they split,
strike seas and they dry up.
Malevolent spirits and evil ghosts,
who dares stand before me?
Those who follow the *gāng* live,
those who oppose it perish.
Wherever my body goes,
misfortune is forever severed.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command.

Standing evenly, he knocks his teeth together three times. Next, he pinches the Mudra of the Original Master at the *yín* position and secretly recites:
Open the Gate of Heaven, close the Earth’s Door at *hài*; leave the Human Gate at *xùn*, block the Ghost Road at *kūn*. *Yín* pierces the ghost’s heart, *chén* crosses *xū* to rupture the ghost’s belly, *shēn* crosses *yín* to form the Golden Beam, *yǒu* crosses *mǎo* to erect the Jade Pillar. *Wǔ* descends straight to *chǒu*, encircling the Four Mountains; the thumb traces the four fingers’ tips to invert the Five Peaks; the thumb traces from the second finger’s tip across the four fingers’ backs to conceal; pinch the second finger’s third joint, gather the *gāng* *qi*, from *xū* pinch to *chén*, reciting □□□□□□□.

Form the Dipper Mudra: pinch the middle joint of the four fingers, the little finger bent over the roots of the four fingers, the four fingers bent into the palm—ten thousand evils submit, disasters self-destruct. The *shā* mudra at the left side of the middle finger’s second joint.

Next recite the incantation:
I receive the Heart-Seal Treasure of the Celestial Master,
naturally bestowed, penetrating the hidden and reaching the dark,
ascending to pervade the Grotto-Heavens.
I walk the Yu Steps, attain the Dao and become immortal,
the Three Hun assist and guard,
the Seven Po follow and move,
neither exiting nor entering,
forever preserving celestial years.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command.

Next, pinch the Mudra of the Original Destiny at the *hài* position and secretly recite the incantation:
Three Hun Lads,
Seven Po Generals,
follow me in pacing the Dipper,
wishing to cross the numinous barrier.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command.

Step back, gather the *gāng* *qi* to suffuse the altar. The left hand forms the Dipper Seal, the right hand the Sword Mudra.

Secretly recite:
Reverently summon the General of Establishing the *Gāng*,
the General of Raising the *Gāng*,
the General of Releasing the *Gāng*,
hasten to raise the *gāng* for me.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command.

Reverently summon the General of Raising the Dipper,
the General of Releasing the Dipper,
the General of Casting the Dipper,
hasten to pace the Dipper for me.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command.

He visualizes the Three Generals of the *Gāng* emerging from the Earth’s Door, wearing blue headscarves and crimson robes, riding fiery clouds. The Three Generals of the Dipper emerge from the Gate of Heaven, wearing blue headscarves and white robes, within yellow clouds. The Generals of the *Gāng* array the Southern Dipper from the Gate of Heaven to the Three Terraces and return. The Generals of the Dipper array the Northern Dipper from the Earth’s Door to the Three Terraces and circle back. The Six Generals cross at the Three Terraces, merging into Three Generals, clad in blue, yellow, and white, each holding a star of the Three Terraces, riding the Three Terraces to illuminate the altar.

Next, facing south, he recites:
Reverently invite the Nine Phoenixes Breaking Filth Perfected,
the Great General of Burning Filth,
the Great General of Removing Filth,
descend upon the ritual altar,
dissolve and remove all defilements.

He visualizes a perfected one from the south, clad in vermilion, riding a nine-headed phoenix, flying to the altar and spewing fire to burn away all filth completely.

The *Gāng* of the Nine Phoenixes Breaking Filth:
The *Huōluò* Yin Dipper.

The incantation states:
The Dipper’s essence wondrous—twelve celestial stems,
Riding the Celestial *Gāng*, martial might arrayed.
Qi drifts and sways like floating clouds,
Nine transformations stir, ascending to align with Heaven.
The six pitch-pipes unite, upholding *jiǎ* and *yǐ*,
Treading *Tiānyīng*, pacing *Tiānrèn*,
Embracing *Tiānzhù*, cradling *Tiānxīn*,
Henceforth crossing to mount *Tiānqín*,
Leaning on *Tiānfǔ*, gazing toward *Tiānchōng*,
Entering *Tiānnèi*, emerging as *Tiānpéng*.
Wherever the Dipper spirits traverse,
May they lend their numinous radiance,
Aid my great Dao,
Establish the upright and expel the perverse,
And grant my heart’s spirit.
After one chant, pace the six hours,
Emerging from profound obscurity—thousands upon ten thousands of years.

Swift as the Primordial Dipper’s pace, by command and ordinance!

*Huōluò* Yang Dipper

The incantation states:
I enter *Tiānnèi* from *Tiānpéng*,
Turning to return, meeting *Tiānchōng* as *Tiānfǔ* retreats.
Entering *Tiānqín* to face the heart,
Passing *Tiānzhù* to convene with *Tiānrèn* and *Tiānyīng*.
The human path opens, the ghostly path seals,
All myriad evils and defilements withdraw.
Swift as the Primordial Dipper’s pace, by command and ordinance!

*Cánghún* Dipper

The incantation states:

One *pò* enters *Tānláng*,
Two *pò* hide in *Jùmén*,
Three *pò* reside in *Lùcún*,
Four *pò* dwell in *Wénqū*,
Five *pò* enfold *Liánzhēn*,
Six *pò* confront *Wǔqū*,
Three *hún* return to *Zuǒfǔ*,
Seven *pò* hasten to *Tiāngāng*,
The *Sāntái* gather at the Dipper’s mouth,
At court’s rise, *Pòjūn* shatters the sovereign.

Another incantation states:
O majestic Northern Dipper,
Fore *Kuí*, aft *Gāng*.
Descending from heaven,
My body conceals in obeisance.
Whoever violates my bounds
Shall instantly meet celestial calamity.
Swift as the ordinance commands!

*Wǔléi Sǎoxié Gāng*

The incantation states:
One step—heavenly thunder stirs,
Two steps—earth and water flow,
Three steps—thunderfire erupts,
Four steps—thunderclap resounds.
Five steps—dispatching,
Five Thunder Envoys,
Sweeping malignance before,
Seizing dust behind.
O spirits, spirits,
Ascend to the Three Clarities!
Five Thunder Envoys,
Thunder and lightning follow.
Swift as the ordinance commands!

A stick of precious incense,
The ten directions purified,
Three rolls of the dharma drum,
All spirits assemble.

Burn incense to summon the incense officials of the Dharma Court’s direct altar,
The direct altar’s earth deities,
The Three Realms’ merit officers,
The Four Directing Envoys,
The swift-reporting Thunderbolt Envoy Zhang,
The Two Envoys Pan and Cai of the Orthodox Unity Divine Officials’ Court,
The Two Directing Talismans Zhang and Sun,
The Expelling Malignance Court’s Envoy Xu,
The Earth Deities’ Envoy Xie,
The land deities along the path to Mount Tai,
The Merit Officers Wang and Lu of the Fengdu Summoning Court,
Hasten to the altar for dispatch.

*Incantation to Summon the Earth Deity*
This land’s deity,
Most numinous of spirits,
Soaring through heaven, plunging to earth,
Emerging from obscurity, entering darkness.
Convey my petition,
Without delay.
On the day of merit,
Your name shall be inscribed in the Upper Clarity.
Swift as the ordinance commands!

*Incantation to Summon the Talisman Envoys*
Pure and numinous,
Talisman envoys emerge from their camp,
Riding wind, racing lightning,
Patrolling the Three Realms.
Hearing my summons,
Hasten to the altar and announce your names.
One call, a hundred responses,
No negligence or disdain.
Swift as the ordinance commands!

I entreat you, merit officers and generals,
Convey sincerity and earnestness,
Summon for me the marshalling earth generals of this *jìng*,
And all the marshaling officers and soldiers of the great dharma’s ranks,
Hasten to the altar,
Manifesting clear responses.

Dispatch one division to summon,
Awaiting immediate resonance.

The incantation states:
Talisman envoys, talisman envoys,
Officers and soldiers, officers and soldiers,
Merit officers, merit officers,
Emerging from obscurity, entering darkness.
Receive this command,
Summon the generals and soldiers,
Hasten to the altar,
Execute with urgency!
I stand before the altar,
Brandishing my sword in vigil.
With a single decree—profound and obscure,
Heaven and earth co-arise.
Spirits transform in an instant,
Gathering into form.
Hearing the summons, they arrive,
Resonating with the numinous.
Northern Court’s generals and soldiers,
Descend with haste!
Swift as the ordinance commands!

Burn incense to summon the marshalling generals of this *jìng*,
The Judging Marshal of the *Jìng*,
The Vice Marshal,
The Northern Culmen’s Expelling Malignance Court’s marshalling general,
The *Gāng*-headed Supreme Marshal,
The Nine Prison Wardens,
The Five *Dīng* Divine Generals,
The Prison-Guarding Generals,
The Pursuing Hammer Wardens,
The Dipper’s marshaling officers and soldiers,
Bestow your descent,
Awaiting manifest responses.

The incantation states:
The Northern Emperor’s generals,
Charged with expelling malignance,
Vast in numinous power,
With sharp claws and long fangs,
Their might shakes heaven and earth,
Their *qi* spreads through clouds and mist.
Commanding officers and soldiers,
Dispatching *yèchā*.
Behind, swords and halberds follow,
Before, thunder chariots advance,
Their majestic wind scours the earth,
Stirring stones and scattering sand.
Rewarding the upright,
Seizing and capturing demonic malignance.
All malevolent ghosts causing harm
Shall be utterly captured.
Swift as the ordinance commands!

Upon completing the incantation, press the *mǎo* sign, inhale the northern *qi*, and blow upon the incense burner. Visualize the Northern Court’s generals and soldiers, their black banners and regalia, arrayed before the altar.

Burn incense to summon the swift-reporting Thunderbolt Envoy Zhang,
Hasten to the altar,
Manifesting clear responses.

Press the *chén* sign and recite the incantation:
Swift General,
Descend with haste, descend with haste!
Supreme Numinous Truth, Supreme Numinous Truth,
By the Emperor’s decree,
I swiftly summon the Thunder Division’s spirits,
Hasten upon the clouds!
Swift as the *Kāngmín* ordinance commands!
Hasten!

Visualize you are the august Heavenly Joy Deity of wrathful might in the clouds,
Proceed directly to the southeast *xùn* palace,
Summoning the Jade Treasury, Jade Pivot,
Five Thunder Envoys’ Court,
Thunderbolt Directorate,
Supreme Tàiyǐ Purple Tenuity Thunderbolt Directorate,
Northern Emperor’s Thunderbolt Directorate,
Penglai Water Directorate,
Each with two great marshals,
Six great divine generals,
And twelve hundred thunder soldiers.

The thunderbolt’s fierce officers, Judging Official Xīn Dūdū Yùqīng,
Cloud-Thunder Judging Official Xiè Zhēnjūn,
Central Heaven’s *Xūhuǒ* Ordinance Great Deity Dèng Yuánshuài,
Thunder Duke Jiāng General,
Lightning Mother Xiù General,
Wind Earl Fāng General,
Rain Master Chén General,
Hasten to the altar,
Glorifying the Orthodox Teachings.

*Thunder Bureau*, *zǐ* sign,
Draw the southeast *qi* and recite the incantation:
Heavenly Mystery, Great Void,
Six Dragons’ Golden Essence,
I summon the Supreme Ultimate’s officers and soldiers to act swiftly,
The Four Directorates descend with soldiers,
Thunderfire and wind arise,
Jade Capital’s decree descends,
Without delay!
Swift as the Thunderbolt Fire Ordinance commands!

Heaven and earth’s divine radiance,
Concealing elite soldiers.
Thunder masters stir the wind,
Sun and moon shine brilliantly.
I recite the Great Cavern,
Armor and weapons rush in chaos,
Hasten to my altar,
*Kuí* Star and *Tiāngāng*!
Swift as the ordinance commands!

Upon completing the incantation, face the southeast *xùn* direction. Visualize the thunder deity *Xūhuǒ*, riding a dragon and leading thunder soldiers, arriving before the altar in multitudes.

Burn incense to summon the Two Envoys Pān Yuán and Cài Mǐn of the Mysterious Numinous Jade Pivot Treasury’s Orthodox Unity Divine Officials’ Court,
The Two Directing Talismans Zhāng and Sūn,
And all affiliated divine officials, generals, and officers,
Hasten to the altar,
Manifesting clear responses.

The incantation states:
Oṃ.

Hūm hūṃ tra hūm hūṃ □, Yuán and Mǐn, hasten here! Svāhā.
Recite thrice, then burn incense to summon and invite:
Marshal of All-Heaven Chén the Divine Official,
Marshal of the Horizontal Heavens Mǎ the Divine Official,
Marshal of the Rushing Heavens Zhū the Divine Official,
Vice-General of the Fire Gourd,
Vice-General of the Fire Brick,
Great General of the White Serpent and Fire Crow,
Great General of the Faceless,
Great General of the Golden Spear and Fire Lasso,
Great General of the Golden Brick and Fire Gourd,
And the officers and soldiers of the Six Heavens’ Primal Unity,
To assist in the ritual and manifest clear responses.

The incantation states:
Divine Officials and Marshals,
Three heads and nine eyes.
Moving mountains and damming seas,
Fierce flames soar through the sky.
Marshal of All-Heaven,
Sternly riding a fire dragon.
*Dīngjiǎ* Great Generals,
Seizing ghosts and tracking traces.
Divine Officials of the Fire Department,
Crows lead as vanguard.
Iron gourds and fire flames,
Binding ghosts and capturing fiends.
Great General of the White Serpent,
Spitting *qi* to form dragons.
Molten metal blazing,
Hurling fire forward in charge.
I now summon you to swiftly descend from on high.
By the Emperor’s decree,
No leniency shall be granted.
Swift as the ordinance commands!

The *Gāng* spirits are hasty,
The gods most revered.
Black mist flows from their noses,
Enveloping heaven and earth.
Holding precious swords,
Treading upon fire wheels.
Evil demons who hear this,
Shatter in fear and dread.
Upon hearing my summons,
Swiftly emerge from the celestial registers.
Swift as the ordinance commands!

Clasp the *chén* talisman, draw the *qi* of the Heavenly Gate.
Burn incense to summon and invite:
Divine Envoy Xiè Yòu of the Earthly Thearchs’ Bureau,
The earth gods along the roads of Mount Tài,
Hasten to the altar to receive this commission.

The incantation states:
Black-Killer Sage, Black-Killer Spirit,
Summon the talisman officers to the altar court.
Swift as the ordinance commands!

Burn incense to summon:
Dú-Tǐ, the Earthly Thearchs’ Bureau’s Yìlíng Zhāowǔ Wēn, Grand Guardian,
Along with the four great *Tiāndīng* divine generals of the Cui, Lu, Deng, and Dou clans under his command,
Hasten to the altar and await clear reports.

The incantation states:
*Qián*’s Primal Fire Decree,
Uniting luminous majesty.
By the Emperor’s command,
The Five Peaks bear the charge.
Talisman officers arrive at once,
Fierce generals hasten here.
By the Supreme Emperor’s decree,
Summon Yìlíng Zhāowǔ Wēn, Grand Guardian,
To swiftly descend before the altar.
Swift as the ordinance commands!

Burn incense to summon:
Marshal Hé, the Great Sage Bó, Lord of the Three Hun and Master of the Hundred Nodes, of the Northern *Kuí*’s Xuán-Fàn Prefecture’s Divine Tiger and Male Left Jade Office,
Marshal Qiáo, the Great Sage Zhǔ, Lord of the Seven Pò and Master of Blood *Qi*, of the Divine Tiger and Female Right Wǔluán Department,
The Three Departments’ Soul-Pursuing Envoys, Lords Zhāng and Wèi,
The Four Great Generals Lǔ, Huán, Liú, and Wú, Great Spirits of Seizing, Summoning, and Pursuing Souls,
The Soul-Pursuing and Soul-Guiding Lads,
And all affiliated divine officials, generals, and officers,
Hasten to the altar to manifest clear responses.

The incantation states:
Mysterious Heaven’s Jade Talisman,
*Yín*’s Divine Tiger talisman script.
*Mǎo*’s Primal Unity true essence,
*Chén* aligns with the talisman’s pact.
*Sì*’s Supreme Unity and Mysterious Darkness,
*Wǔ* opens *yáng* and awakens *yīn*.
*Wèi*, the myriad spirits listen,
*Shēn*, dare you not heed the summons?
*Yǒu*’s Divine Tiger Jade Maiden,
*Xū*’s Divine Tiger officers and soldiers.
*Hài* seizes all,
*Zǐ* shall not tarry.
*Chǒu* receives the talisman’s command.
Three fingers down, proclaim to the cold courts.
Three fingers middle, pursue souls and seize *pò*.
Three fingers up, reveal shadows and forms.
Yet to come, attend the ritual assembly,
At noon report merits to the Jade Capital.
Swift as the ordinance commands!

Burn incense to summon and invoke Supreme Unity’s Fire Mansion Marshals: Commander-in-Chief Lord Li of the General Administration, Invocator Lord Zhu; Radiant Might Commanding Marshal Qiu, Chief Overseer of the Grand Bureau; Vice-Marshal Wang, Thunderclap and Lightning Enforcer; Marshal Chen, Disperser of Clouds and Commander of Flying Mists; Marshal Li, Master of Wind Transformation and Azure Thunder; Marshal Kong, Exorcist of Demons and Slayer of Ghosts; Marshal Cui, Fire-Thunder Punisher of Evil; Marshal Zhou, Water-Thunder Illuminator and Executioner; Marshal Ji, Lightning’s Radiance and Flying Fire; Marshal Liu, Black Thunder Driver of Rain; Marshal Lin, Swift-Seizing Flying Thunder Enforcer of Ordinances; Marshal Bai, Mysterious Bureau Direct Talisman-Wielder and Thunder Driver; Messenger of the Three Heavens Marshal Xie, Chief Supervisor Marshal Zhuang, Urgent Memorializer Marshal Zhang; the Five Great Thunder Deities of the Five Directions—Zhu, Zhu, Liu, Zhang, and Yang; the Four Great Heavenly Generals of the Altar’s Perimeter—Gao, Tao, Cui, and Zhao; the Four Great Thunder Deities—Meng, Huang, Ma, and Chen; Lord Thunder, Mother Lightning, Master Wind, and Master Rain—all assemble at the altar to receive this commission.

The incantation states:
*Oṃ.*

Hūm hūm, dōu shù, Brahmā-responding thunder roars and seizes.
By the True King’s solemn decree, the Jade Emperor’s edict is issued.
All spirits under heaven, heed the command of this altar—none may disobey.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Divine Empyrean’s primordial descending oral decree and ordinance!

Burn incense, summon, and invoke:
From the Great Dao of Cavernous Mystery, the presiding master of the law, Flame Thearch Deng Heavenly Lord;
Radiant Flow of Hua-Yin’s Effulgence, Vermilion Heavenly Lord of the Great One;
Flying Light of the Fire Bell, Supreme Sage Heavenly Lord of the Great One;
Wooden Youth of the Great One, Supreme Sage Heavenly Lord;
The Three, Five, and Nine Yangs’ Fire Master Lü Divine Lord of Shaoyang;
The Eight Great Divine Lords—Cai, Jin, Su, Chen, Zhang, Jiang, Bi, and Cheng.

Fiery Flowing Metal Fire Bell, Great Immortal Xie of Fire;
Fire-Dwelling Earl Zhou Marshal;
Yin-Yang Thunder-Operating Yu and Ren, the Two Great Marshals;
Azure Fang and Iron Face, Heavenly Lord Liu;
Officers and generals of the Jade Slips and Sword-Tip Law of the Great One;
The inner and outer ramparts of the Cavernous Mystery, the left and right courts of the Nine Heavens, all affiliated thunder marshals and thunder soldiers;
Envoys of the Barbarian Thunders of the Five Directions;
All departments of perfected great spirits—
Each is invited to attend the altar and receive this commission.

The incantation states:
*Hūm □ dā □ dā □ □ dā □ □ dā □ □ dā □ dā kā □ □ xī yí tí □ lī dā □ □ jiè xì.*
As in the ordinance of the Primordial Cavernous Mystery Thunder Sovereign Emperor.
One qi, three repetitions.

Burn incense, summon, and invoke:
From the Great Dao of Pure Tenuity, the Western Terrace’s Commander-in-Chief, Wolf-Fang Valiant Officer Chen Marshal;
Vice General Shi Marshal;
The Nine Heavens’ Responsive Primordial Swift Ordinance, Numinous Flying Divine Talisman Envoy Zhang Messenger;
From the *Jade Pivot Scripture*’s thunderous and blazing law, the Five Great Heavenly Lords—Deng, Xin, Zhang, Xun, and Liu—
Hasten to the altar’s front to manifestly reveal karmic response.
Swiftly!

Burn incense, summon, and invoke:
From the Southern Culmen and Northern Heart’s Orthodox Law of the Three Luminaries, the talisman officers;
From the Dipper’s Numinous Writ and Heavenly Heart Law’s departments, the marshals, generals, officers, soldiers, and White Seizers;
From the Great Thunder Law, the Thunder Gate’s Left Demon-Quelling Envoy, Supervisor of the Southern Culmen’s Heavenly Pivot Court and General Administrator of the Thunder Bureau’s One Prefecture, Two Courts, and Three Offices, Marshal Gou;
The Thunder Gate’s Right Demon-Quelling Envoy, Director of the Northern Culmen’s Demon-Dispelling Court and Military Overseer of the Thunder Bureau, Marshal Bi;
The Thirty-Six Thunder Drum Valiant Warriors;
The Seventy-Two Examiners and Summoning Spirits;
The Four Great Envoys—Chen, Liu, Sun, and Zhang—
Hasten to the altar’s front to immediately manifest karmic response.

The incantation states:
*Oṃ.*

**[Characters indistinct]... qi and fury seize them.**
Left *Li*, right *Kan*—
Burn incense, summon the Fengdu Bright-Numinous Beheader-Demon Marshal Guan, together with his attendant officials, generals, and soldiers. Hasten to the altar’s front to immediately manifest karmic response.

The incantation states:
*Oṃ.*
Heaven’s Son at *Ji-Wu*, Earth at *Mao*—speed, *You*, seize!
Recite the Central Slayer Text: *Oṃ.*
*Zi* *Hūm*, *Chou* *Hūm*, Center [indistinct] *Dui* *Zhà*—*Wei*, speed, *Zi*, seize!

At noon, burn incense and summon the Orthodox Unity Mysterious Altar Metal-Chariot Empowered Dharma Marshal Zhao, Vice-General Huang, Left Vice-General Wu, Right Vice-General Bai, the Tiger Guards of the Two Bureaus and Eight Valiant Kings, the Six Poison Great Spirits, the Five Directions’ Thunder Generals, the Five Directions’ Frenzied Soldiers, the Twenty-Eight Constellations’ Divine Kings, the Heaven-Harmonized and Earth-United Two Great Official-Generals, the Four *Ding* Great Spirits, and all others. Upon hearing this summons, rush to the altar with all haste.

The incantation states:
Subtle and wondrous, true emptiness—
*Chou*’s spirit, *Xiao*’s numinous lineage.
*Chou* drives thunder-servants and lightning;
*Shen* makes fire and wind race.
Slayer spirits, might without bound—
*Hai* seizes and binds demonic fiends.
*Xu*’s spirit shakes thunder’s roar;
*Dui*’s spirit thunders with a devouring howl.
Slayer spirits—one crow’s caw,
And at *Si*, ten thousand ghosts crowd in;
At *Xun*, ten thousand ghosts vanish without trace.
Slayers enter the Thunder Bureau—*Hasten! Hasten!*
As the Orthodox Unity Ancestral Celestial Master,
Six Harmonies’ Boundless Lofty Illustrious Emperor decrees!

Burn incense, summon the Supreme Clarity Heavenly Peng Gate’s One-*Qi* Commander-in-Chief Marshal Zhou, the Flying Eagle and Running Hound Great General, the Four-Eyed Elder Chen General, the Yellow Judgment Officer, the Thunder Envoy, the No-Mercy Divine King, the Mighty Sword Divine King, the Faceless Divine King, the Deaf Soldiers and Mute Generals, the Heavenly Couriers and Armored Troops, the Direct-Month Five Generals, the Thirty-Six Great Heavenly Generals, the Numinous Officials and Jade Maidens, the Iron-Spade Divine King, the Fishermen, Hunters, and Netters, the Blood Basin Great General, the Upper Prime Tang General, the Middle Prime Ge General, the Lower Prime Zhou General, the Demon-Seizing Demon-Eating Officers, the Ghost-Seizing Ghost-Eating Officers, the *Qi*-Seizing *Qi*-Eating Officers, the Essence-Seizing Essence-Eating Officers, the *Zhu*-Seizing *Zhu*-Eating Officers, the Malevolent-Seizing Malevolent-Eating Officers, the Wounded-Seizing Wounded-Eating Officers, the Poison-Seizing Poison-Eating Officers, the Witch-Slaying Shrine-Destroying Officers, the Bureau’s Dipper-Guiding Dipper-Measuring Slayer Divine Kings, the Battle-Engaging Divine Kings, the Talisman-Wielding Ghost-Seizing Counter-Inspecting Officers and Soldiers, the Ghost-Slaying Ghost-Examining Ghost-Slaying Ghost-Binding Ghost-Capturing Officers and Soldiers, the Merit-Contending Battle-Entering Ghost-Pursuing Ghost-Seizing Ghost-Binding Ghost-Shackling Ghost-Torturing Officers and Soldiers, and all talisman-wielding, seal-bearing, tally-marching great spirits. Upon hearing this summons, hasten to the altar with all speed.

Burn incense, summon the All-Heaven Thunder-Chief Swift-Fire Decree Marshal Deng, the Wind-Bearing Fierce Officer Silver-Fanged Gleaming-Eyed Marshal Xin, the Fire-Thunder Flying-Swift Demon-Punishing Karmic-Response Envoy Zhang, the Demon-Bright Fierce Blazing Lightning-Fierce Slayer-of-Evil Primordial Five Envoys, the Jiang-Bi-Hua-Lei-Chen Beheading-Examining Five Envoys, the Ma-Guo-Fang-Deng-Tian-Man-Thunder Five Envoys, the Guo-Liu-Hu-Bi-Zhao-Long-Thunder Five Envoys, the Wang-Zhang-Guan-Shi-Xiao-Yue-Thunder Five Envoys, the Thunder Lords and Lightning Mothers, the Wind Earls and Rain Masters, the Great Spirits, the Thunderclap Slayer-Punishment Chief Enforcer Mighty Divine Azure-Fanged Iron-Faced Celestial Lord Liu, the Purple Tenuity Soaring Heaven Thunder Marshal Kong, the Earth Bureau Grand Year Marshal Yin, the Unfaithful-to-Dao-and-Dharma Marshal Zhu, and all others. Assemble at the altar to immediately manifest karmic response.

Burn incense, summon the Supreme Ultimate Sacrificial Refinement Universal Salvation Court’s Cinnabar Heaven Left Guard Great General, Right Guard Great General, the Heaven-Penetrating Heaven-True Great Spirits, the Three Bureaus’ Soul-Summoning Spirit-Seizing Salvation-Raising Officers and Clerks. All are commanded to arrive at the altar to display the Dao’s power.

The incantation states:
Most High Mysterious Prime Supreme Lord of the Dao,
Instruct your servant to wield talismans,
Illuminating the dark prisons—
Let the dead souls depart,
Seven generations ascend and transcend.
Supreme Ultimate officials and generals,
Hasten to the altar’s front—
*Hasten! Hasten!* As the decree commands!

The dead souls receive refinement,
Transmuted into immortals, reborn as humans.
The living receive salvation,
Enduring through kalpas, everlasting.
Through kalpas they revolve,
Matching heaven’s years.
Forever delivered from the Three Ways, Five Sufferings, Eight Difficulties,
Transcending the Three Realms,
Roaming carefree in the Supreme Clarity.
*Hasten! Hasten!* As the decree commands!

Envision the Immortal Elders with the Cinnabar Heaven Generals and the Water-Fire Two Generals, each arriving at the altar.

Burn incense, summon the Fengdu Examination-Summoning Court’s Wang and Lu Merit-Officers and Envoys. Hasten to the altar to receive this commission.

The incantation states:
*Oṃ.*

*Oṃ maṇi svāhā.*

Burn incense, summoning the Fierce-Capturing Court’s Jiao and Zeng Perfected Lords of the northeast quadrant of Fengdu, along with the Eight Great Generals of the Inner Altar—Wei, Liu, Wang, Meng, Che, Xia, Lie, and Sang—and the Eight Great Generals of the Outer Altar—Wen, Zhong, Zhu, Xu, Zhang, Shen, Chen, and Xie. At the command’s call, hasten immediately to the altar’s front.

The incantation states:
I am sent by Heaven and Earth,
Traversing the celestial realms,
Punishing and seizing demonic soldiers.
The Four Directions align with the altar’s straightness,
Summoning the Three Officials,
Receiving from the Nine Bureaus.

The Four Departments, Five Thearchs’ examining officers,
Mighty celestial warriors,
Ox-Head jailers,
Wielding punitive divine soldiers,
Controllers of records, controllers of fate,
Controllers of merit, controllers of execution—
All adjudicating clerks and divine soldiers.

Hasten to summon Fengdu’s Three Marshals and adjudicating clerks,
One hundred twenty numinous officials attending the altar,
Descending to assist my true qi,
Heeding my Supreme command,
Enforcing the statutes of this court.

*Yin* script, northeast qi.
*Oṃ.*
*Hūṃ lau □□ lau □□ lau □ oṃ □□ hrīḥ □ storm-thunder □ da hrīḥ □ ulu □ imperially seize.*

Burn incense to summon the officials of all ranks within the ritual methods—
Those who capture and consume deviant forces,
Those who capture and consume ghosts,
Those who capture and consume poisons,
Those who capture and consume qi,
The Celestial Healers,
The Divine Pharmacists,
The Merit-Recording Functionaries for Healing—
All hasten to the altar’s fore,
Manifesting clear retribution.

By this imperial edict, summon and dispatch the principal and deputy marshals, officers, and soldiers of each department.
Now that you have arrived,
Each shall assume your designated post and rank,
Stationing permanently to assist in the ritual’s execution,
Greatly fulfilling numinous might,
Manifesting auspicious responses.

Next recite:
By the Emperor’s mandate, I command the myriad spirits.
Burning incense to summon, I reveal the original truth.
Officials, generals, officers, and soldiers of all bureaus and courts—
Whether principal or deputy, whether celestial attendants or not—
At the first call, respond in unison,
Arraying yourselves left and right to await my decrees.
The slightest disobedience or delay shall incur the standard punishments.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Supreme statutes and edicts!

Once the ritual’s purpose is fulfilled,
All summoned marshals, generals, officers, and soldiers of the ritual departments,
Having bathed in grace and arrived at the altar,
Shall express sincere devotion.
Those assigned to guard the altar shall guard it,
Those tasked with pacification shall pacify,
Ever diligent in your duties,
Each upholding your post,
Striving to establish merit,
Fulfilling and exalting the Great Dao.
When summoned again, return as before,
In accordance with precedent.

Next recite:
Thunder rumbles in the hidden depths,
Dragon and Tiger intertwine.
Jade sashes and golden belts—
All marshals and soldiers of the departments.
Following the seal’s command, they encamp,
Each guarding their own quarters.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the Supreme statutes for the return of the spirits.

Step back, and visualize the stars and constellations above the altar.
To the left, trace the *chen* pattern, with *ding* standing firm, and recite:
The stars and the Dipper return to their course,
Steps retrace the Pure Hall.
Divine beasts assist me,
A hundred spirits lend their support.
I tread the stars and constellations,
Shining with the radiance of sun and moon.
A thousand calamities vanish,
Ten thousand blessings bring auspiciousness.
Swiftly, swiftly, in accordance with the statutes and decrees.

Trace the *chen* pattern to the left,
Visualize the starlight dispersing,
Then inhale once with the mouth, swallowing the primordial official,
Bow in reverence, and withdraw.

The divine marshal of this talisman bears the surname Yiqi and the given name Yanqing. He stands three *cun* tall, barefoot, with unbound hair, clad in crimson robes, and wields a vajra hammer. He can enter the human abdomen to cure illness and seize evil, causing the afflicted to vomit or purge blue or yellow water, bringing immediate relief.

Whenever *sui*-spirits cause illness, inducing abdominal pain, frenzied wandering, locked jaw, or muteness—or when assailed by headless, deaf, or mute ghosts—inscribe this talisman, call his name, and bid him enter the abdomen to capture and expel the spirit at once.

**Talisman for Treating *Husun* Bone**
**Incantation:**

*Ti!*
*Jili tata jili chi she!*

With one breath, recite seven times.

For this method, first prepare sesame oil. Heat a needle until red-hot, then let it cool. Next, sift fine chaff ash and spread it upon a table. Have the child sit facing the ash, extending one hand—left for boys, right for girls—and press the palm into the ash. Before imprinting, first examine the child’s middle finger pulse. Then, with the previously heated needle, pierce the child’s middle joint to a depth of two *fen*, withdraw it, and observe the drop of toxic fluid that emerges. If it clings to the hand with a thread-like strand, watery and red in hue, it is female; if white, it is male. Take a five-colored thread, roughly three *chi* in length, and pass it through the incense burner’s smoke. Visualize the Fire-Bell General amidst flames above, bell in left hand and fire-rope in right. Envision the general casting down the five-colored thread, which transforms into an iron chain. After a moment, encircle the child’s neck with the chain and bind it securely, beginning the knot at the child’s *gu men*. Next, burn the aforementioned talisman and place nine moxa cones upon the handprint in the ash, specifically at the middle joint of the middle finger where the imprint was made. Light a sesame oil lamp and apply seven moxa cauterizations. With each cauterization, recite once:

*[...] [...] [...] [...] [...] [...] [...]*
All fox-spirits and myriad illnesses vanish.

Grasp the child’s bound hand and press it into the ash at the *dou sha* position. Then recite:

*[...] [...] [...] [...] [...] [...] [...]*
Draw the Fire-Bell General’s fiery *qi* and blow it into the moxa point. Utter the word *she* once, then seven times in total. Press the moxa ash into the child’s middle finger at the needle point. The illness will be cured at once.

*Swiftly, swiftly, as in the statutes and ordinances!*

In the southern quarter lies a pool; within the pool, water; within the water, a fish with three heads and nine tails. It does not consume the five grains of the human realm—only malaria ghosts.

When inscribing the talisman, focus solely on summoning a marshal into the sign. Write only the character for "horse," ensuring it is precise and reverent, never careless or cursive. If the horse’s four legs appear nimble, the talisman is efficacious. Take utmost care lest the birthing woman suffer misfortune—prudence is paramount.
Once the talisman is complete, have her swallow it with downstream water. If carrying the talisman, place it on the left for a boy, on the right for a girl. Observe the stroke’s exit: a single trail signifies a boy, a double trail a girl.

**Talisman for Dispelling Female Pollution and Purifying the Body**
To dispel female pollution, inscribe this talisman, burn it to ash, face southeast, draw qi, and blow it into the body—greatly efficacious.

**Method for Selecting Auspicious Times for Ritual Action**
*Day of the Rat:* Ritual fails at the Ox hour; ghosts fail at the Sheep hour.
*Day of the Ox:* Ritual fails at the Dog hour; ghosts fail at the Sheep hour.
*Day of the Tiger:* Ritual fails at the Monkey hour; ghosts fail at the Rat hour.
*Day of the Rabbit:* Ritual fails at the Monkey hour; ghosts fail at the Horse hour.
*Day of the Dragon:* Ritual fails at the Pig hour; ghosts fail at the Rat hour.
*Day of the Snake:* Ritual fails at the Sheep hour; ghosts fail at the Ox hour.
*Day of the Horse:* Ritual fails at the Rat hour; ghosts fail at the Rabbit hour.
*Day of the Sheep:* Ritual fails at the Dragon hour; ghosts fail at the Rooster hour.
*Day of the Monkey:* Ritual fails at the Rabbit hour; ghosts fail at the Ox hour.
*Day of the Rooster:* Ritual fails at the Monkey hour; ghosts fail at the Ox hour.
*Day of the Dog:* Ritual fails at the Dog hour; ghosts fail at the Ox hour.
*Day of the Pig:* Ritual fails at the Rooster hour; ghosts fail at the Tiger hour.

**Heavenly Barrier Days**
First month: Tiger. Second: Rat. Third: Dog. Fourth: Monkey. Fifth: Horse. Sixth: Dragon. Seventh: Tiger. Eighth: Rat. Ninth: Dog. Tenth: Monkey. Eleventh: Horse. Twelfth: Dragon.
Avoid prayers on Dragon days.

**Commander-in-Chief Marshal Wuji of Song.** Green-faced, three-eyed, three-headed, six-armed, clad in golden armor, wielding a spear.

**Vice-Commander Marshal Xu Ji.** The Five Directions’ Pursuit-and-Capture Marshal Zhao Gongming. In his transformed aspect: green-faced, golden-armored, with fangs bared, a mirror helm, and spear in hand.

**Marshal Chen, the Great Exorcist.** **Marshal Liu, the Great Ghost-Burner.** **Marshal Gong, the Great Beheader, whose blade drips blood.**

The Six Ding and Six Jia spirits—seizers, binders, shacklers, and torturers—along with the Wind-Bearing True Yin, fierce clerks, and the entire host of interrogators and inquisitors.

**Purification Incantation**
Within the cavern, emptiness and mystery; radiant, the Great Primordial.
The mighty spirits of the eight directions empower me by nature.
By the talismanic command of the Numinous Treasure, I proclaim to the Nine Heavens.
*Qianluo Danna*, the cavern’s might and the Great Mystery’s power—
Slay demons, bind evil, and slaughter ten thousand ghosts.

The **Central Mountain Divine Incantation**, the Jade Text of the Primordial Beginning.
Recite once: banish ghosts and prolong life.
Traverse the Five Peaks; the Eight Seas hear and know.
The Demon Kings bow their heads, guarding my hall.
Baneful filth disperses; the Dao’s qi endures forever.
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!*

When performing this ritual, first sweep and purify the afflicted person’s chamber. Then burn the talisman upon the ground, envisioning the fire’s *qi* rising. With a sword, trace an empty well-character (井) upon the earth, reciting:

*First stroke: Heaven is cleansed,*
*Second stroke: Earth is pacified,*
*Third stroke: Humans attain longevity,*
*Fourth stroke: The Fire Prison is formed.*

With the left hand, invoke the Yin Dipper and blow its essence upon the ground. With the right hand, circulate the *qi* (○), envisioning a golden well sinking ten thousand *zhang* deep and wide into the earth. Next, scatter ashes upon the ground and recite the **Incantation to Consecrate the Ash Altar**:

*Consecrate this pure ash altar, radiant and resplendently clear.*
*Above, it opens the Three Heavens; below, it illuminates the Three Paths’ rifts.*
*The hells manifest in jagged peaks; the Pass of Mount Luo stands sealed.*
*Each mote of dust gleams and flickers; every generation suffers chills and fevers.*
*A single grasp spans the sand-realm; the four directions are all pierced through.*
*By this, the Heavenly Prison is formed, and all banners and standards appear.*
*Celestial immortals and spirits, upon seeing it, fall into dismay.*
*All lawless ghosts are seized without pause, captured forever without return.*
*Bound within the Iron Mountain’s winding passes.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Statutes and Ordinances of the Great Emperor of the Southern Pole!*

Next, inscribe the **Demon-Quelling Diagram** and the **Execution Script**. Then, light the lamp and inhale a mouthful of southern *qi*. Invoke the Dipper of the South and recite the **Incantation to the Star Lord of Fire Virtue**:

*Fierce horns bristle like dragon and phoenix; awe-inspiring radiance rebukes the ten directions.*
*Cinnabar *gang* illumines the five watches of night; vermilion flames blaze along the three edges.*
*Essence and clarity align with the true *qi*; swords and halberds gleam with martial authority.*
*Rushing comets retreat; wayward stars dare not advance.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as commanded by the Great Emperor of the Southern Pole!*

Next, recite the **Incantation for Encircling the Prison with Lamplight**:

*Fire blazes, wind races—transformed into a prison courtyard.*
*Serpents coil, tigers prowl; thunder roars and lightning flashes.*
*Earth darkens, Heaven dims; the cosmos is overturned.*
*Heavenly nets and earthly snares, swords and halberds encircle all.*
*The Fire Prison’s wardens, appear swiftly!*
*Let the ghosts below now receive Heaven’s decree.*
*By the Emperor’s command, act without delay!*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Great Emperor of the Southern Pole!*

Then, burn the remaining embers beneath the afflicted person’s written petition. Take up the mirror and recite the incantation:

*Ancient mirror, reveal the thousand-year-old ghost; bright lamp, burn away the ten-thousand-year-old evil.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!*

Direct the Dipper’s execution *qi* onto the mirror. Envision within the southern fire-clouds a palace hall, its red plaque inscribed in gold with the words *Southern Court Fire Prison*. Draw it in with a breath and blow it onto the altar. See the Fire Prison vast and boundless, its chief and deputy generals, all officials and soldiers, led by the Pacifying General, seizing ghosts and delivering them to the prison to execute the Fire Decree. Envision within the prison a bridge of fire *qi* extending directly into the afflicted person’s ( ). With the right hand, form the sword mudra as the bridge; with the left, hold the lamp’s embers and recite the incantation. The master invokes the Southern Dipper, stepping the Dipper’s *gang* to exit the prison. Proclaim:

*Burning incense, I once more summon the Chief General [Name], along with all officials and generals of the Dharma host.*
*Hearing this summons, hasten swiftly to the altar.*

State the purpose. Burn the **Prison-Immolating Talisman** within the prison. Invoke the Yin Dipper, face the *xun* direction, and envision all generals of the ritual descending. Recite the **Dispatching Incantation**:

*Great Thunder of the Primordial Sky, lightning shakes the void.*
*Three million blades and soldiers, flames scatter within the prison city.*
*Should any defy my command, the Emperor will not tolerate it.*
*Seize them beneath the *Kuigang*; bestow upon them the Pure and Sharp Blade.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Emperor’s statutes and ordinances!*

Next, invoke the Yin Dipper once more, sealing the prison. Envision the celestial generals standing guard at the prison gate. Recite the **Summoning Incantation**:

*Reverently summon the Great Black Spirit of Flying Heaven, who commands flying thunder and wields lightning to seal the prison gate.*
*The Perfected of the Three Heavens and the Heavenly Ding, with me, bind and interrogate the guilty.*
*The officials and soldiers of this altar assist the Dharma in their inquiry, fulfilling their duty to save living beings in the world.*
*Should any dare resist or refuse, seize them and deliver them to the Fire Prison to be annihilated.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as commanded by the Great Emperor of the South!*

Upon completing the incantation, form a sealing mudra in the void, securing the prison gate. Perform the Six Methods:

*Open the Gate of Heaven, close the Door of Earth;*
*Leave the Gate of Man open, block the Ghost Road.*
*Lay the Golden Beam horizontally, erect the Jade Pillar;*
*Pierce the ghost’s heart, rupture the ghost’s belly.*
*Encompass the Four Mountains, trace the Five Peaks;*
*Gather the *gang* *qi*, grasp the Dipper’s mudra.*
*All demons submit, ghosts self-destruct.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by the Statutes and Ordinances of the Great Emperor of Longevity of the Southern Pole!*

**Nine Provinces’ *Gang***
Envision Heaven and Earth overturned, invoking the *gang* into the prison. Recite the incantation:

*Jizhou, the first *kan*; Li, the ninth, in the south;*
*Left, Qingzhou, the third; right, Liangzhou, the seventh.*
*Qian, the sixth, Yongzhou; Xun, the fourth, Xuxiang.*
*Kun, the second, Xingzhou; Gen, the eighth, Yanzhou.*
*Center, the fifth, Yuzhou—no evil can hide.*
*Wind races, thunder roars, lightning flashes.*
*Ghosts of the Three Realms, seize them beneath the *Kuigang*!*
*Compress the Nine Provinces into one province, one province into one county,*
*One county into one village, one village into one hamlet, one hamlet into my palm.*
*Compress Heaven into Earth, Earth into Heaven;*
*East into West, West into East;*
*South into North, North into South;*
*Above into Below, Below into Above;*
*All four directions and above and below, compressed into the space of a square inch.*
*Wind rages, rain pours, thunder and lightning roar.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!*

Again, employ the **Halo Dipper’s *Gang*** to hasten the process. If the prison’s traces remain unclear, use the **Execution Diagram** and draw in northern *qi* to blow upon it.

**Locking Method**
*Copper head, iron feet, fire eyes, golden pupils.*
*Envoys of the Three Officials, lock down the demonic essence.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!*

To the right, carve a **Yin Dipper** formation. At the site of *sha qi*, when the **Celestial Stem** manifests, visualize the red radiance of the characters **□植**, draw it in, and blow it to envelop the prison. Silently visualize it appearing once, then recite the prison incantation:

*Divine Might, Divine Might,*
*demonic forms obliterated.*
*I now dissolve the prison,*
*later to establish communion with the numinous.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!*

Next, spray a mouthful of water and recite the incantation:

*Limpid waters,*
*blossoming with the essence of sun and moon.*
*Within lies the Northern Dipper,*
*internally aligned with the Three Terraces.*
*Sacred water sprayed,*
*misfortune departs, fortune arrives.*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as decreed by statute and ordinance!*

After reciting the above incantation, have someone sweep the ashes out the door. The practitioner forms the **Sword Mudra**, and outside the door, traces an empty **"Well" character** in the air, declaring:

*One stroke forms a river,*
*two strokes form a stream,*
*three strokes, the Yellow River flows backward,*
*four strokes, a hundred ghosts lose their path.*
*The heavens blur,*
*the earth blurs,*
*a hundred ghosts forget their coming,*
*ten thousand ghosts forget their going.*

Again, silently circulate the **○**, grasp the **Dipper Mudra**, and, following the previous six methods, offer prayers and send them forth.

**Burning the Ghost-Exorcising Talisman with Lamp Wick Ashes**
*Upper Terrace: Empty Essence*
*Middle Terrace: Sixfold Purity*
*Lower Terrace: Curved Life*
*Barbs bristle, dragon and phoenix wield awe-inspiring might,*
*commanding the ten directions with the Crimson Stem’s radiance.*
*At midnight, the vermilion flames blaze,*
*three edges gleam with luminous clarity.*
*The talisman of upright qi, the sword and halberd,*
*flash with martial authority, seizing and annihilating.*
*Comets and baleful stars dare not approach—*
*draw in the fire qi!*

*Bing Ding, Bing Ding,*
*Fire Script, Fire Perfected,*
*of the Southern Continent of Jambudvīpa.*
*Li Branch Fire, Fire begets Fire, Fire flourishes,*
*Fire Bell, Fire Wheel.*
*Bing Ding, Ding Bing.*
*Blazing Emperor Wuji General,*
*arise with great fire to burn, refine, and slay demonic spirits!*
*Swiftly, swiftly, as commanded by the Great Emperor of the Southern Pole!*

**Incantation:**
*Oṃ, Hui Wei, as decreed by the Dipper, Vi□ Ya Emperor, seize!*
*Ah! Southern qi.*

Once the talisman is complete, visualize the **Marshal Song Wuji**: green-faced, three-headed, six-armed, his body wreathed in flames, wielding a fire spear, fire lasso, fire sword, and fire bell, riding a fire cloud into the talisman. Then, infuse it with *sha qi* and press it upon the character for "ghost."

**Seizing Talisman**
This talisman is used in three copies. If the characters "fire prison" are present, it is employed at the initial establishment. If the characters "urgent seizure" are added, it is used for dispatching. If the character "lock" is added, it is used within the **Locking Method**.

**Golden Net, Iron Web to Enclose and Capture Demonic Spirits**
*Forests and groves, trees and woods—search meticulously!*
*Upper Prime: Heavenly Official, swiftly seize the spirits!*
*Middle Prime: Earthly Official, swiftly seize the ghosts!*
*Lower Prime: Water Official, swiftly seize the demons!*
*Officers and soldiers of this altar,*
*swiftly apprehend the source of calamity!*
*All fifteen kinds of malevolent ghosts—*
*heads severed, feet cut off—*
*swiftly seize them at their root, swiftly act!*

**The Dao Possesses a Spirit**
Named **Heavenly Soldier**, who receives the mandate of the Nine Heavens, serves the Three Clarities, and roams the world to slay and subdue demonic spirits. With one command, the Five Peaks crumble; bound are the hordes of demons. Beheaded are the ghostly soldiers by the thousands; their forms severed by the tens of thousands. Those who dare resist in Fengdu are doomed; the wicked perish, the virtuous thrive. The Six Heavens’ sunken souls are recorded one by one. Those who defy me are diminished; those who obey me prosper. Flying and roaming, disaster and *sha*—who dares alter the netherworld? Swiftly, swiftly, carve a **Yin Dipper** formation, break open the Xun gate, and behold Marshal Zhao wielding his fire spear entering the talisman!

**Commanding the Dharma Marshal Zhao Gongming**
*Command the Dharma to drive forth the ghost,*
*reveal its true form!*
*The Heavenly Emperor releases the chapter,*
*adorned with the Celestial Stem of the Five Directions.*
*Why do malevolent ghosts not perish?*
*With a single inhalation of the Flying Immortal,*
*ten thousand ghosts vanish without a trace.*
*Great Sage of the Celestial Stem,*
*Oṃ Hūṃ Hāṃ Da Lī, seize!*
*Draw the Stem’s qi into the talisman.*

On yang days: *Greed, Giant, Prosperity, Literature, Integrity, Military, Ruin, Submission*—from top to bottom.
On yin days: *□□□□□□□*—from bottom to top.

Light incense and summon again all the generals and officers of the various bureaus to swiftly seize and capture headless, footless, mountain *xiaos*, stone spirits, earthen and wooden demons, foxes with single legs, and the fifteen kinds of unorthodox, base malevolence. Scribes and interrogating officers, investigate the causes of their crimes.

Generals and officers of Fengdu, stewards of mountains and rivers,
hear the summons and arrive at once, respond to the call and manifest numinously.

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes command!*

The Four Great Divine Continents’ Fire Generals,

Draw the *Gang* qi into myself and receive the Southern Culmen Great Emperor’s decree to slay ghosts.

Next, recite the *Great Majestic Virtue Mantra* and apply [the talisman]. *Oṃ. Hūṃ hūṃ. Trāṇa hāna yán qián yí lì.*

Nine Heavens’ Supreme Fire Division, *Boundless Great Majestic Virtue Spirit-King*, command the Nine Heavens’ Great Thunderfire to arise—flying fire, rushing fire, molten-metal-hurling fire, Seven Stars’ thunderclap fire, raging thunder’s blazing fire. The Nine Heavens’ Supreme Fire King, sternly mounted upon *kuilong*, riding a flying tiger, lion and white *ze*, *bìngxiù* qilin, fire camels, fire elephants, fire eagles, fire hawks, fire beasts of ten thousand grasses, copper-headed and iron-faced, a million spirit soldiers, Five Emperors’ ritual blades, Four Heavens’ roving patrols, the Emperor’s Bell shaking, all demonic paths startled.

Grotto-heavens and blessed lands, mountains and rivers, dark nether realms, city gods and earth spirits—all unruly ghosts and gods—mountains collapse, trees shatter, the hundred grains seethe and boil. What ghost dares resist? Those who do not submit shall be compelled to compliance.

The Giant-Mouthed Wind King, Fire Lads and Fire Maidens, fire dragons and fire horses descend from Heaven. *Bing*-*Ding* Generals surge forth from the earth. Fire clouds spread *qi*; eight dragons gallop. The Five Generals of the Supreme Heaven devour thunder and roar. Flying sand and rolling stones, uprooting trees and displacing roots. The wind axle turns left; the fire chariot spins right. Illuminating the Three Realms, transforming into a crimson city. Beneath the Eight Trigrams’ Dipper, the Thunder Division encircles. Enforce the statutes, unleash Heaven’s might. Raging flames and fierce winds, thunderclaps resounding. Ghostly spirits who witness this plunge ten thousand *zhang* into the earth, reduced to flying ash. Ancient trees and malevolent shrines become eternal dust and mud.

*Swiftly, swiftly, as the statutes of the Nine Heavens’ Supreme Thunderfire Division’s Boundless Great Majestic Virtue Spirit-King, Fire-Thunder-Wind-Cloud command!*
